etc.aloe.processes
Class CrossValidationPrep<T extends LabelableItem>

java.lang.Object
  etc.aloe.processes.CrossValidationPrep<T>

public class CrossValidationPrep<T extends LabelableItem>
extends java.lang.Object

CrossValidationPrep prepares a set of labeled entities for cross validation.

Help function needed for stratification of set.

Parameters:

stratify

public java.util.List<T> stratify(java.util.List<T> instances,
                                  int numFolds)
Stratifies a set of instances according to its class values if the class attribute is nominal (so that afterwards a stratified cross-validation can be performed).

Parameters:
instances -
numFolds - the number of folds in the cross-validation

swap

public void swap(java.util.List<T> instances,
                 int i,
                 int j)
Swaps two instances in the set.

Parameters:
i - the first segment's index (index starts with 0)
j - the second segment's index (index starts with 0)
